item.title: Build up litter over X mas & NY period, 4th January
item.description:
Build up of litter along Hengist - Ethelbert, Horsa Rd & Northumberland. There generally more rubbish and lots of tissue & toilet paper ( no idea where this comes from) in roads & pavements please can the scheduled highways road litter pick take place especially as it not been done since before Christmas?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hengist Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned rubbish, 4th January
item.description:
There's a big bunch of rubbish in the street. I've already reported this and got an update stating that the issue was solved but that stuff is still there. Can you please send someone over to remove it and also give a good clean at the entire street?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rosina Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bikes dumped and left in basement area, 4th January
item.description:
Council need to get the person/people from 25 Bew Court to remove their bikes. E-bike has been left there for 16months. Cleaner who has been living in the cleaners staff room and shed area leaves his bike here too. Sometimes there can be up to 3-4 bikes left unattended here at one time. It is a danger safety hazard. Other tenants have reported this matter and still nothing done or resolved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
